page.title: 02Leisure-Malpas and Bettws
page.content: We asked about 150{11 year old {children}what kind of things they did in their spare time.We found out that over three-quarters of them ride on their{bicycles}in the evening and then watch television. About half of them have{video}recorders at home and watch recordings of films.Another favourite pastime is{swimming.}Many children go to the pool at Bettws Comprehensive School{Leisure Centre.} There are numbers of clubs in the area.The most popular are soccer, dancing , gymnastics , brownies , and guides. Some children also go horse riding. The{Malpas Gymnastics Club}meets at Crindau school and{Albion Rovers}Youth Soccer teams play on Crindau Park.
